executive_orders.title: End DEI Discrimination
executive_orders.description: Establish policies that prohibit discrimination based on race, gender, or any other identifier in government contracts and funding.

executive_orders.title: Defend Women's Rights
executive_orders.description: Implement measures to protect women's rights in the workplace, including equal pay and support for working mothers.

executive_orders.title: Unleash American Energy
executive_orders.description: Remove unnecessary regulations that hinder the development of American energy resources, promoting energy independence.

executive_orders.title: Promote Fairness in Education
executive_orders.description: Eliminate policies that prioritize DEI initiatives over merit-based evaluations in educational institutions.

document.document_title: Ending Illegal Discrimination and Restoring Merit-Based Opportunity

DEI_Policy_Termination.title: Termination of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Policies
DEI_Policy_Termination.summary: All federal agencies must terminate DEI offices, Chief Diversity Officers, and any initiatives promoting race- or gender-based preferences within 60 days.
actions: Rescind affirmative action and workforce balancing programs.
Withdraw prior executive orders related to DEI (including EO 11246).
Require agencies to submit termination reports to the OMB.
DEI_Policy_Termination.purpose: To restore merit-based equal opportunity and uphold the Civil Rights Act of 1964.

Biological_Sex_Definition.title: Protection of Biological Sex Definition
Biological_Sex_Definition.summary: Defines 'sex' strictly as biological and immutable, distinct from 'gender identity'.
actions: Mandate all federal documentation and policies to use biological sex categories.
Ban funding for gender ideology programs.
Ensure single-sex facilities are restricted according to biological sex.

Energy_Policy_Reform.title: Unleashing American Energy Policy
Energy_Policy_Reform.summary: Prioritizes fossil fuels and nuclear development, revokes several climate-related executive orders, and accelerates energy permits.
actions: Suspend disbursement of Inflation Reduction Act green energy funds.
Abolish the 'social cost of carbon' metric.
Energy_Policy_Reform.purpose: To strengthen energy independence, economic growth, and national security.
